item.title: Can't find X and Y variables?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Ceres, post:1, topic:388954”]Okay I am using the code below to delete all of the objects in a building, but for some reason when I compile it cannot find the X an Y variables.

for(x = 2543; x < 2550; x++) { for(y = 3111; y < 3118; y++) { deletethatobject(x, y); } }
Help please? Thanks![/quote]
you’ve omitted the variable type in your for loop

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

why does it have a x equal to then a x less then? hmm might b the problem… same goes for y. try x <2543; x > 2550 and y < 3111; y >3118

item.title: Can't find X and Y variables?
item.dc:creator: @Ceres Ceres
item.description:
@Ceres wrote:

Okay I am using the code below to delete all of the objects in a building, but for some reason when I compile it cannot find the X an Y variables.

for(x = 2543; x < 2550; x++) { for(y = 3111; y < 3118; y++) { deletethatobject(x, y); } }

Help please? Thanks!
